condition.description:
Meningococci are a type of bacteria that cause serious infections. The most common infection is meningitis, which is an inflammation of the thin tissue that surrounds the brain and spinal cord. Meningococci can also cause other problems, including a serious bloodstream infection called sepsis.

Meningococcal infections can spread from person to person. Risk factors include

  • Age - it is more common in infants, teens, and young adults
  • Living in close quarters, such as in college dorms or military settings
  • Certain medical conditions, such as not having a spleen
  • Travel to areas where meningococcal disease is common

In its early stages, you may have flu-like symptoms and a stiff neck. But the disease can progress quickly and can be fatal. Early diagnosis and treatment are extremely important. Lab tests on your blood and cerebrospinal fluid can tell if you have it. Treatment is with antibiotics. Since the infection spreads from person to person, family members may also need to be treated.

A vaccine can prevent meningococcal infections.
condition.name: Meningococcal infection

carousel_items: Both men and women should use barrier methods of birth control while on Minocycline since it can cause birth defects and make birth control pills less effective.
Can make you dizzy, so be careful if you're getting up from lying down or sitting. Don't drive until you know how it affects you.
Can stain your teeth, tongue and gums, but this is temporary.
Take this exactly how your doctor or pharmacist tells you until it's all gone.
Don't eat any dairy products or take any vitamins within 2 hours of taking Minocycline because they can make the medication less effective.

basics.benefits_moa: Minocycline is a tetracycline antibiotic. It stops bacteria by preventing them from reproducing and repairing themselves.
basics.bottom_line: Minocycline is an effective way to treat certain skin infections, acne, and rosacea, but you'll need to use barrier methods of birth control since it can make birth control pills less effective and cause birth defects.
downsides: It can make birth control pills less effective, so people should use barrier methods of birth control like condoms or diaphragms while on Minocycline.
Can stain your teeth, mouth, and gums if you're using the tablets, or your skin if you're using the topical version, but this is temporary.

downsides_processed.orig: It can make birth control pills less effective, so people should use barrier methods of birth control like condoms or diaphragms while on Minocycline.
Can stain your teeth, mouth, and gums if you're using the tablets, or your skin if you're using the topical version, but this is temporary.

upsides: Clinical studies show it's effective against MRSA, a common skin infection, and it's commonly used to treat acne and rosacea.
Available as a generic, so it should be reasonably priced.
Minocycline is less likely to cause sunburn than other tetracycline antibiotics.
Bacteria are less likely to become resistant to Minocycline than other tetracycline antibiotics.

upsides_processed.orig: Clinical studies show it's effective against MRSA, a common skin infection, and it's commonly used to treat acne and rosacea.
Available as a generic, so it should be reasonably priced.
Minocycline is less likely to cause sunburn than other tetracycline antibiotics.
Bacteria are less likely to become resistant to Minocycline than other tetracycline antibiotics.

userStories.tip: For the generic brand there are restrictions on when you take the medication so pay attention to labels

drugs.name: Minocycline

labeled_indications.indication: Infections that can't be treated with penicillin medications

carousel_items_processed.orig: Both men and women should use barrier methods of birth control while on Minocycline since it can cause birth defects and make birth control pills less effective.
Can make you dizzy, so be careful if you're getting up from lying down or sitting. Don't drive until you know how it affects you.
Can stain your teeth, tongue and gums, but this is temporary.
Take this exactly how your doctor or pharmacist tells you until it's all gone.
Don't eat any dairy products or take any vitamins within 2 hours of taking Minocycline because they can make the medication less effective.

risks_warnings.title: Changes in teeth
risks_warnings.description: This medication can cause changes in the color and development of teeth in fetuses and in children younger than 8 years old. Your doctor will recommend alternative medications.

description_processed.orig: This medication can cause changes in the color and development of teeth in fetuses and in children younger than 8 years old. Your doctor will recommend alternative medications.

risks_warnings.title: Decreased effectiveness of birth control pills
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking Minocycline and you're also on birth control pills, the birth control can become less effective. Consider using a barrier form of birth control (condoms, diaphragms, etc.) while taking Minocycline.

description_processed.orig: If you're taking Minocycline and you're also on birth control pills, the birth control can become less effective. Consider using a barrier form of birth control (condoms, diaphragms, etc.) while taking Minocycline.

risks_warnings.title: Diarrhea from a superinfection (an infection that happens after, or in addition to, an earlier infection)
risks_warnings.description: Taking antibiotics, like Minocycline can increase your chance of getting certain fungal or bacterial infections that causes diarrhea and can be contagious. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor since this can be a rare but serious side effect.

description_processed.orig: Taking antibiotics, like Minocycline can increase your chance of getting certain fungal or bacterial infections that causes diarrhea and can be contagious. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor since this can be a rare but serious side effect.

risks_warnings.title: Rash
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of severe skin rashes that can require hospitalization or can serious injury. These have been rare, but talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with a fever.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of severe skin rashes that can require hospitalization or can serious injury. These have been rare, but talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with a fever.

risks_warnings.title: Sunburn
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking Minocycline and have to be out in the sun for an extended amount of time, put on sunblock on the exposed areas of skin. Your skin can be more sensitive to the sun and is at higher risk for sunburn.

description_processed.orig: If you're taking Minocycline and have to be out in the sun for an extended amount of time, put on sunblock on the exposed areas of skin. Your skin can be more sensitive to the sun and is at higher risk for sunburn.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to fetus
risks_warnings.description: Minocycline may cause birth defects. Don't use Minocycline while pregnant. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

description_processed.orig: Minocycline may cause birth defects. Don't use Minocycline while pregnant. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.
